member.name: T:Castle.Facilities.AspectSharp.AopProxyFactory
member.summary: Specialization of that checks for aspects in the model and potential mixins.

member.name: T:Castle.Facilities.AspectSharp.ContainerInvocationDispatcher
member.summary: This specialization of DefaultInvocationDispatcher only check if the AopAlliance interceptor can be obtained from the kernel. If not, the standard flow is used.
